name: Mashed Celery Root And Potatoes
keywords: celeriac, celery root, potato, fall, gluten-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Trim and peel the celery root, cut into large chunks and place in a bowl of water as you proceed. Peel the potatoes and cut into chunks. Place vegetables in a steamer or in water, in separate pans, and cook until tender when tested with a skewer.
Drain the vegetables if boiled. Press them through a food mill or sieve. Season with salt and pepper and stir in butter. Serve immediately.
